AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: involved in the stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; considered the behavior of vehicles' drivers in determining reasonable suspicion to stop; followed suspicious vehicles for approximately five minutes; conducted a roving stop; familiar with most vehicles on Farm-to-Market Road 2050; interacted with law enforcement during the traffic stop; involved in the arrest and questioning of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; location of questioning; had sufficient evidence to conclude that two vehicles were driving in tandem; agents were expected to arrive at the scene; involved in an incident where Agent Benavides asked IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. questions en route to the Border Patrol station; noted that smugglers frequently use rental cars
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: held a hearing on the pending motions to suppress and considered factors for reasonable suspicion; analyzed evidence including district traffic maps of Farm-to-Market Road 2050 and U.S. Highway 59
